channel.title: Playername Jumble Bug
channel.description:
Has anyone ever actually found out what causes the client to scramble the playername upon login to some sources? Ive heard its an antileech, ive heard its compatibility issues regarding the signlink? What actually causes this?
Ex: You type in your username as I Pk I and where your name would be once you login is Akdltiv8evps or something crazy.

item.title: Playername Jumble Bug
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

The client I am using has nothing to do with it as it works on some servers but on others such as delta sources, it jumbles the name. Its gotta be server side.

Read full topic

item.title: Playername Jumble Bug
item.dc:creator: @blackmanbad blackmanbad
item.description:
@blackmanbad wrote:

Depends on the client your using also.

Read full topic

item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

I realize that. But what solves it. I know what the problem is. Just not whats causing it.

Read full topic
